Luke Ho, Money Maverick at Money MaverickLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 08 Apr 2019They did answer that it was against the STI.I benchmark against a particular absolute return of 8% annualized net of fees, though.You  should aim higher if you're young. https://www.facebook.com/luke.ho.540 comments0
